function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of cheap and easy-to-install IoT sensors and devices","Impact":"Higher maintenance cost and difficulty in integration into existing facilities","Mitigation":"Developing low-cost, plug-and-play sensing devices with self-configuration and self-adaptation capabilities","Technologies":"Ultra Low Power SoC, intelligent human-computer interaction","People":"Facility owners, IoT system users","Owner":"IoT device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Data security and privacy concerns in the context of pandemic regulations","Impact":"Potential infringement of people's rights and privacy","Mitigation":"Reviewing emergency regulations to ensure protection of people's rights and privacy","Technologies":"Secure data transmission, encryption, privacy-preserving technologies","People":"General public, policy makers","Owner":"Government authorities, technology developers"}]}
